notes: All composables follow Vue 3 Composition API patterns
Each composable returns { data, loading, error, refetch } pattern
Polling composable includes visibility handling (pauses when tab hidden)
API client supports all endpoints: fleet, routing, NAT, IPS, VPN, QoS, DDNS, reports, logs, dashboards
Utility functions match existing portal patterns (formatBytes, formatRate, etc.)
TypeScript errors for missing 'vue' module are expected - will resolve when astro-setup completes
Two minor type errors in useAuth and usePolling will be fixed by linter agent
